p: The microdilution method was used in accordance to the document M27-A3 [ 25], using the culture medium RPMI 1640 (pH 7.0 ± 0.1) buffered with 0.165 M of morpholinepropanesulfonic acid (MOPS) (Sigma, USA). All samples were prepared in dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO) (Sigma, USA) in a maximum 2% proportion to avoid interference in the microorganism structure. The extracts SHE, SEE, LEE, LEE (FM), BEE, and BEE (AF) were tested in concentrations ranging from 1000 to 1 µg/mL and the compounds amentoflavone and kaempferol 3- O-rutenoside in the range from 500 to 0.97 µg/mL.
